Compound | Senior Software Engineer | Full-time | San Francisco Bay Area | https://compound.finance

At Compound, we're creating interest rate markets for blockchain currencies, which are necessary for future economies to flourish.

We are an ventured-backed start up building smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. We are looking for talented engineers to help us in the short-term build provably correct smart contracts. Longer-term, we want to be the financial infrastructure for all blockchain assets. We'll build developer and community tools to promote the platform and grow assets under management.

We build in Solidity, Elixir and Elm, but no hard requirements.

Contact emily at compound dot finance
